new_commits.subject: Fix: umbrella PR query should not filter by author (github-actions creates PRs)
Add Feature B component
new_commits.body:
This is another independent feature that is unrelated to Feature A.
It should be in a separate PR that can land independently.

new_commits.subject: Add Feature A component
new_commits.body:
This is an independent feature that adds a new reusable component.
It can safely land on main without breaking anything.
